scripts.clean: (cd frontend && yarn clean) ; (cd backend && yarn clean)
scripts.postinstall: concurrently 'cd frontend && yarn install' 'cd backend && yarn install' -n frontend,backend -c green,blue
scripts.build: concurrently 'cd frontend && yarn build' 'cd backend && yarn build' -n frontend,backend -c green,blue
scripts.lint: cd frontend && yarn lint && cd ../backend && yarn lint
scripts.prettier: concurrently 'cd frontend && yarn prettier'  'cd backend && yarn prettier' -n frontend,backend -c green,blue
